title: Viagra Font Forgery
content:
The European market is being swamped with forged Viagra pills. The clipping from a photo seen in today's Heidelberg newspaper shows that the font for typesetting "Pfizer" was forged too.

see [www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/viagra.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015041608/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/viagra.jpg "www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/viagra.jpg")

(to the left: original, to the right: forgery)

By the way: The word "Viagra" is a "forgery" of the Sanskrit word "vyaghra", which originally denoted "he who smells scents by opening his jaws" (Manfred Mayrhofer).
author: Uli
